text: Because I Said So is a 2007 romantic comedy movie. The movie is about an overbearing mother who is concerned about her three daughters. Diane Keaton plays Daphne. Mandy Moore plays Milly. Piper Perabo plays Mae. Lauren Graham plays Maggie. Because I Said So got negative reviews from critics. But it did very well at the box office. It took in more than $69 million against a $39 million budget. ==Other websites== * Category:2007 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies
title: Because I Said So
